title: pAlincu gOpAla
sahitya:
pAlincu gOpAla shauri nA moralincu gOpa vihAri


anupallavi



caraNam 1    Ela nAmIda parAku calamu cAlu nyAyamu gAdu nIku
    caraNam 2    mOdamu mIraga nIvu nA mungalayElanu rAvu
    caraNam 3    vEmAru moraliDa nIvu vini vinanaTTu ela yunnAvu
    caraNam 4    ullamu ranjilla nEDu nannu callagakI kaNTajUDu
    caraNam 5    nEramulanniyu mAnu Emi nErccina vADanu gAnu
    caraNam 6    mODi Ela nAmIda nIdu muddu mOmu jUparAdA
    caraNam 7    karuNa jUDumi vELa nannu kanna taNDri tALa jAla
    caraNam 8    pAlita gOpAladAsa surapAla rAdhA manOllAsa
